subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: David Phelps, who grew up near St. Louis rooting for the Cardinals, was not as his best in allowing five runs and eight hits in six innings, but neither was the Yankees’ defense behind him.
snippet: David Phelps, who grew up near St. Louis rooting for the Cardinals, was not as his best in allowing five runs and eight hits in six innings, but neither was the Yankees’ defense behind him.
